alert.note: Alert for Taliaferro; Warren; Wilkes (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 22 at 11:16PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Warren, northeastern Taliaferro and Wilkes Counties through 1145 PM EDT... At 1116 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Ficklin, or near Washington, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Washington, Tignall, Norwood, Sharon, Ficklin, Cadley, Lundberg, Metasville, Floral Hill, Holliday Park, Aonia, Danburg, Rocky Creek Fire Dept., Raytown and Sandy Cross. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
